description: Try our easy to follow Osso Bucco recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Osso Bucco Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve osso bucco scattered with gremolata. Tip 1: Serve osso bucco with wet polenta, mashed potato or rice. Tip 2: Make a double batch and freeze one. Tip 3: Any left over osso bucco can be shredded back into remaining sauce and served over pasta as a ragu.
